content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) for iron ore supply.

### Coal Supply at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) for coal mining.

### Inserter System at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) connected to the coal supply and iron plate factory.

### Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5), position(x=44.5, y=-81.5), position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of three wooden chests for storing items.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items.
### Errors when extracting items from an empty furnace
- Ensure the furnace contains the item to be extracted before attempting to extract.
### Errors when a mining drill is out of fuel
- Ensure the mining drill has a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
### Errors when an inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has a source of items to pick up and insert.
### Errors when a furnace fuel source is full
- Ensure the furnace fuel source is not full to avoid blocking the furnace operation.
